description: Updates the DataSourceName of a DataSource. You can use the GetDataSource operation to view the contents of the updated data element.

parameters.name: DataSourceId
parameters.description: The ID assigned to the DataSource during creation.

parameters.name: DataSourceName
parameters.description: A new user-supplied name or description of the DataSource that will replace the current description.

nested_items.name: DataSourceId
nested_items.description: The ID assigned to the DataSource during creation. This value should be identical to the value of the DataSourceID in the request.
